commit.message:
file watcher preparations (#80)

* added incron and task-spooler

Added incron for folder watching and task-spooler for task queueing

* startup sequence changed

* moved variable to dedicated config file
* renamed internal variable
  * to be consistent on both sides (host/container)
  * to meet bash coding style
* moved variable into paperyard „namespace“ to avoid collision
* moved root path logic from config to start
* renamed script (coding style)

* renamed build script (coding style)

* added shebang

* added paperyard config to git ignore

* configuration defaults, documentation and existence checking

Added defaults and documentation to configuration file. Also checking for existence prior to reading config. Will warn when config is not readable and defaults will be used.

* coding style

slightly adjusted spacing/tabs/whitespace/commands/typos (coding style)

* fixed not commented example line

* added incron examples

* removed duplicate entry, renamed crontab file
